jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.
Overview  Package  Class   Use 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Uses of Package
org.jpokemon.pmapi.util

Packages that use org.jpokemon.pmapi.util
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon Provides the classes related to Pokémon themselves. 
org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon.nature Provides classes related to a Pokémon's nature attribute, including the 25 classic natures. 
org.jpokemon.pmapi.util Provides miscellaneous classes and enums related to minor Pokémon attributes such as stats, tastes, and so on. 
 

Classes in org.jpokemon.pmapi.util used by org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon
ExperienceCurve
          Defines the available experience curves for a Pokémon.
 

Classes in org.jpokemon.pmapi.util used by org.jpokemon.pmapi.pokemon.nature
Stat
          Defines the available stats for a Pokémon.
Taste
          Defines the taste preferences a Pokémon may possess.
 

Classes in org.jpokemon.pmapi.util used by org.jpokemon.pmapi.util
ExperienceCurve
          Defines the available experience curves for a Pokémon.
Stat
          Defines the available stats for a Pokémon.
StatusAilment
          Defines the six persistent status ailments a Pokémon may suffer even outside of battle (includes Poison, Frozen, and so on).
Taste
          Defines the taste preferences a Pokémon may possess.
